### TOTAL NUMBER OF ARTICLES: `r nrow(Private)`

## Publication Details

### Type of Publication

```{r, results="asis", echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
dotchart(data.matrix(table(Private$PubType)))
kable(data.frame(table(Private$PubType)), format="html",  caption='Counts')
kable(data.frame(prop.table(table(Private$PubType))), format="html",  caption='Percentage', digits=2)
```

### Publisher
```{r, results="asis", echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
kable(data.frame(table(Private$Publisher)), format="html",  caption='Counts')
```

### Publication Year

```{r, results="asis", echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
dotchart(data.matrix(table(Private$PubYear)))
kable(data.frame(table(Private$PubYear)), format="html",  caption='Counts')
kable(data.frame(prop.table(table(Private$PubYear))), format="html",  caption='Percentage', digits=2)
```

### Publication Language

```{r, results="asis", echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
dotchart(colSums(PubLangGrid))
kable(data.frame(colSums(PubLangGrid)))
kable(prop.table(data.frame(colSums(PubLangGrid))))
```

### Type of Research

```{r, results="asis", echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}

kable(data.frame(colSums(ResearchTypeGrid)), format="html",  caption='Counts')
kable(data.frame(prop.table(colSums(ResearchTypeGrid))), format="html",  caption='Percentage', digits=2)
```
